name: 91-08-04 Sound Test
description:
A scene from a game by Matt Kidd and Colin Sanders. 

A boy experiments with his new tape recorder near his home.

Run, record and ramp up the fun inside your own brain — don't wait for the game to do it for you! How many sounds are there to be captured? Can you get them all in one run? Does it even matter? So many ways to play!

[Note: Best played with headphones, but we're not the boss of you]
